snippet: The company continued to invest in more lucrative automotive and aerospace products and turn away from high-cost smelting facilities.
abstract: Alcoa reports quarterly profit of $159 million, or 11 cents a share, compared with $2.3 billion loss, or $2.19 a share, in year-ago quarter; revenue was $6.4 billion.
lead_paragraph: The company continued to invest in more lucrative automotive and aerospace products and turn away from high-cost smelting facilities.

headline.print_headline: Profit for Alcoa Exceeds Wall Street’s Expectations
headline.main: Profit for Alcoa Exceeds Wall Street’s Expectations
